title: Police Union Blames Mayor, Protesters For Ambush Of 2 NYPD Officers
teaser: Details continue to emerge about the gunman who killed two New York City police officers in Brooklyn over the weekend. As investigators determine what drove Ismaaiyl Brinsely to those acts, some in the NYPD are blaming Mayor Bill de Blasio for dividing police and the community.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
